page.title: 09Industry: Rosneath (2)
page.content: NICOLSON HUGHES SAILS & BOAT DESIGN Ian Nicolson sailed Atlantic single- handed 1954 in 30ft sloop 'StElizabeth Now designs boats. 2 employees. Sail making run by Mr Hughes. Sails made to order for home and abroad. 6 employees, all women, part-time. DEVENNY,STRUCTURAL STEEL ENGINEERS Company moved from Helensburgh because no room for expansion. Since arrival has diversified and now stores pleasure boats, builds barges and in process of infilling part Camsail Bay. Part site sub-let to local joiner. CAMSAIL QUARRY not worked for years. Permission to re-open refused by Council 1984. Decision upheld 1985 on appeal. Much local opposition on grounds of road safety and amenity loss. Second application under review
